text: As a user processing data, I want the ability to move multiple files around and rearrange them using the Neurohub file browser, so that default end.
As a research information manager, I want to segment view and download statistics by country and sector, so that impact of datasets outside academia can be demonstrated.
As an Administrator I'm able to manage people so that I can add edit or delete profiles.
As a trainer admin or editor, I want to turn a course into an event or an event into a course, so that default end.
As an academic publisher, I want to Make persistent web links between my articles and underlying datasets so that My journals can be seen to be filled with robust, high-quality research.

As a trainer, I can create a new course or event. This includes the following information: name, description (HTML), trainer names (multiple selection from a list), start date, end date, venue name (HTML) and address, contact name, contact phone, contact email, a link for more information, and a link to register. For a certification course the name of the class is a dropdown list; for others, it is free text.
As a provider of DRS imaging services, I want access to terms of use statements for objects, so that default end.
As complaint clerk I want to be able to contact the licensure to tell him he has a violation submitted against him.
As a default role, I want the users to extend the validity period of their reservations, so that default end.
As a developer who presents images, I need the granularity to get information about the images associated with a VIA URN, so I can present the user with choices.
As an investigator, I want to view the acceptance test results so that to understand how feature complete the Neurohub node currently is, so that default end.
As a default role, I want the rental transaction to be displayed and the tape to be marked with the date of return, so that default end.
As an international student she would like UC Berkeley systems to handle her address and not make her re-enter it every time.
As a CAWL, I want to apply a five percent discount to my postage rate so that I can receive the correct pricing, so that default end.
As a depositor, I want to Link datasets with the project DMP (possibly from dmponline) so that Compliance with DMP can be demonstrated and the Whole project workflow is linked together.

As a collection owner, I want to hire a programmer to write custom DRS content delivery services pulling up some descriptive metadata structural metadata and enough technical metadata to know the file type to be rendered ) for meeting the special needs of my users, so that default end.
As lab administrator, I want to have increased access to the system to support regular users, so that default end.
As a bath data archive administrator, I want to require a minimum set of metadata, so that consistent quality of metadata is maintained.
As a cataloger I want to be able to see/hear/watch/read the digital object I am cataloging so I don't have to move between multiple applications while I'm creating metadata.
As a user, I want potential causes of turbulence.(weather, unstable air).
Any  outstanding video rentals are displayed  with the amount due on each  tape and   the total amount due.
As a default role, I want other airplane hacks and travel tips, so that default end.
As a site visitor, I want to see a list of all upcoming other courses, so that default end.
As a researcher adding new data to the system, I want to select a partially pre populated template, so that default end.
As a developer I want to define presentation variants in my presentation configuration xml file so I can easily and efficiently deploy my presentation throughout DTAP.
As a researcher, I can access files stored in my Neurohub workspace, using a network drive attached to my workstation.
As a developer or maintainer of related services, I want to deposit and maintain datasets via an API such as SWORD2, so that my service can interact with the archive.

Only the reservations of users that  have been  notified of the availability of a particular book shall be cancelled . Once a  reservation has been  cancelled, the next user shall  be notified , as specified in Req(06) and Req(07).

As a humanities faculty member, I want the DRS to support image content delivery via the international image interoperability framework API, so that web applications from stanford, yale, and johns hopkins can compare harvard digitized manuscripts with versions from their institutions and I can use those comparisons for research and teaching.
As a user, I want to integrate aerial photos into my own web mashup, so that default end.
As a depositor, I want to place data under an embargo, so that my right of first use is protected and I can fulfill my confidentiality responsibilities.
As a user, I want to see a listing of all available data even if it is not available for immediate download or if there are access, so that default end.
As an archivist, I want to indicate an agent to be either the of an, so that default end.
As a user, I want to see elapsed time.
As a collection manager (Amy Benson), I want to be able to pass in a set of URNs, possibly as a result of a HOLLIS search), and get that content back.
As a customer, I want to deposit and retrieve ALTO OCR data, so that default end.
As a site editor, I want to have a prominent area on the home page where I can put special announcements, not necessarily news or articles.
As a user, I want to see a graph of the last two hours of turbulence, so that default end.
As a clerk I want to be able to suspend a license so that the license owner cannot continue work.
As a system administrator, I want to deploy filters run time so that to roll out filter dependent functionality efficiently throughout DTAP, so that default end.
As a collection manager I want to search for records based on status so I can track the progress of a collection.

The system shall reveal the status of each panel, ie : if it  is running, online, or if for any  reason it  is down or  unreachable. It  also  will  show whether the panels have correctly  received the contents that  have been sent  to them.
As a student I want to be able to find important emails even when I'm offline.
As a site visitor, I want to view lists on the site of all certified SCRUMMASTERS practitioners trainers and certified product owners, so that default end.
As a practitioner, I want my profile page to include additional details about me, so that default end.

As a collection owner, I want to hire a programmer to write custom DRS content delivery services pulling up some descriptive metadata structural metadata and enough technical metadata to know the file type to be rendered ) for meeting the special needs of my users, so that default end.
As a developer/maintainer of related services, I want to Deposit and maintain datasets via an API such as SWORD2 so that My service can interact with the archive.
As an Archivist, I want to assign a component unique identifier to a Resource Component (e.g. for a series title).
As a licensing partner, I want the product options to change, so that it reflects my fulfillment needs.
As a provider of DRS imaging services, I want access to terms of use statements for objects, so that default end.
Backend changes to support loading enum value lists from the database.
As a student, I want to filter out email that is not important to me, so that my time is not consumed with managing emails.
As a site visitor, I want to see a list of all upcoming events, so that default end.
As a site member who has read a teaser on the front page, I want to read the entire article, so that default end.
As a Preservation Librarian I want the relationship between masters and derivatives to be managed by the system so I don't have to.
As a site editor, I can update any course or event.
As a student, I want to be planning my schedule all semester.
As a user I can navigate forwards and backwards between log books and log book pages without having to use my browser's back button.
As a corporate sponsor, I want my logo to randomly appear on the home page, so that default end.
As someone who wants to hire, I want to extend an ad for another thirty days by visiting the site and updating the posting, so that default end.
As a user, I want to view and update an inventory of of the equipment and constables that are present in the centre, so that default end.
As a collection manager, I want to pass in a set of URNS possibly as a result of a HOLLIS search ) and get that content back, so that default end.
As an end user, I want to search across all collections at once, so that default end.
As an Administrator I'm able to remove existing media elements of a particular gallery so that I can keep the album up to date.
As a depositor, I want to Place data under an embargo so that My right of first-use is protected and I can fulfill my confidentiality responsibilities.
As a User, I want the 'posted date' included on the list of new/updated data, web services, or web/mobile/desktop applications.
As a user, I want to find the latest GIS data releases by agency by department by program, so that default end.
As a researcher, I want to access files stored in my Neurohub workspace using a network drive attached to my workstation, so that default end.
As a site member (?), I can scroll through a listing of jobs. (There won’t be enough at first to justify search fields.).
As a visitor, I want to see who added the content and when, so that I know more about the contributor of the content.
As user BR PLANTHISTORIAN, I want to change color login screen to make it different from BR PlantViewer, so that default end.

As a trainer who has finished teaching a Certification class, I can load an Excel file (first name, last name, email) into the site. I am prompted for the trainer names (I may not have trained alone), certification date, and type of certification (i.e., CSM or CPO). The names are loaded into a pending state and not yet added to the registry. (Note: We could have this charge $50 per person right then. ).
As an administrator, I want to edit an existing person so that to correct any mistakes, so that default end.
As a default role, I want the library staff to use the list of book loans to search for the books that have to be sent to the faculty, so that default end.
As a default role, I want a user marks a project as being owned by his group, so that default end.
Managerial log entry. Manager opens user's log and interjects a comment. Manager comments are highlighted to draw distinction from user logs. Security: User, manager.
As the university IT service, I want to integrated the archive with existing university systems such as LDAP, so that the cost of administering the system can be kept low.

As an editor I want to show media items from another web initiative using thesaurus relationships of that web initiative on my website so I do not have to reconstruct the thesaurus of the other web initiative for my own website which saves time since its duplication.
As a User, I want access to data and web services which are openly available in a manner consistent with OpenDefinition. org's. . .
As a funding body, I want to be reassure that researchers I fund have robust archival plans for their data so that I can be sure that funding them is a worthwhile investment, so that default end.
As a student I would like help setting a budget.
As a user, I want access to ESRI playerfile used to render GIS data layers, so that default end.
As an administrator, I want to delete an existing news item, so that its removed from the overview.
As a user I can see the provenance of the page (e.g. its log book / log book section) as part of the search results.
As a user, I want to download VT GIS data layers in ESRI shapefile format, so that default end.
As a site admin, I want to edit and delete help wanted ads, so that default end.
As a user, I want to see how many items have been published, so that default end.
Create an admin guide that describes administrative tasks to deploy system, add users, and configure third party tools.

As a default role, I want the system to allow the edition of the characteristics of a newly uploaded content that is you can modify the title description tags activation date and expiration, so that default end.
As a user, I want to know the weather at any given airport, so that default end.
As a default role, I want the staff to send a notification via email when BPL is assigned the case, so that default end.
As a user, I want to be alerted  to upcoming potential  turbulence before it occurs (can be crowdsourced based on previous data).
As a site member, I can mark my email address as private even if the rest of my profile is not.
As a user, I want to download data in non GIS formats, so that default end.
Check RO routes against original, expanded Input Routes.
As a licensing partner I need Papa Johns Clients to be redirected back to www.pjcatalog.com so that they can continue their order process.
As a site editor, I want to designate whether or not an article ever makes the home page, so that default end.
As a default role, I want a user to reserve any number of books, so that default end.
As a marketeer I want to be solve URL conflicts immediately so I avoid not-friendly URLs and thereby will postively influence the overall SE ranking of the website.
As an archivist, I want to associate an instance with a container, so that default end.
As a cataloger I want authority lists to be easily accessible and contextually relevant so it is easy to use the authority.
A user shall be able to reserve any  number of books. Similarly , multiple users shall  be able to reserve any  particular book.
As a student, I want to view and pay my university bills in one place, so that it is more like the real world.
As a user, I would like to be able to VIEW the group's shared calendars via the Neurohub Nodes' Web page as well as on my mobile device.
As a User, I want to have access to Data Warehouse 'capabilities' via a published API (eg: REST endpoint) so I can integrate it. . .
As a user, I want to search by route, so that default end.
As a depositor, I want to allow my collaborators privileged access to datasets, so that we continue to have a productive relationship.
As a site visitor, I need to know as soon as I visit what on earth Scrum is, and why it needs an alliance.
As a csm practitioner or certified product owner, I want to have my name listed in the registry without becoming a member of the site, so that default end.
As a default role, I want to check RO routes against original expanded input routes, so that default end.

As a user I want to see how many Items have been published.
As a site administrator, I want to read practicing and training applications and approve or reject them, so that default end.

As someone who has posted an ad that is about to expire, seven days before it expires I want to be emailed a reminder so that I can go extend the ad. (Note: This means the ad could have an expiration date 37 days into the future, which is fine.).
As a User, I want to post comments about a particular dataset, web service, or application and have those comments show up. . .
As a default role, I want the users to be notified by e mail when a reserved book becomes available, so that default end.
As a user, I want to know the weather of both locations, so that default end.
As an archivist, I want to associate a subject record with a resource description, so that default end.
Log entry summary. User adds a one-line summary when creating a log entry. (This summary would be useful for reporting.).

Change is computed  and  displayed.
As an editor, I want to maintain language labels for different site parts by categories so that I can search and maintain language labels easily, so that default end.

Faculty shall be able to use ACMELIS to borrow books without having to visit the library in person. To do this , and respecting the constraints set out in Req(16), Req(17), Req(18) and Req(19), they  shall  enter the loan data in ACMELIS.

As a release engineer, I want to configure nightly builds that automatically perform a Neurohub installation on a * * virgin operating system * * execute tests and report back results without requiring any * * manual input or interaction * *, so that default end.

As a provider of DRS imaging services, I need access to terms of use statements for objects. For example, aA limited menu of HL use-permissions statements could be formulated, stashed in DRS, and associated with individual resources, or whole classes of resources. When we allow our digital resources to be used outside of our library systems (e. g. within DPLA, or other applications like the Library Lab funded Zeega project), the object can travel with the requisite use-permissions.
